_header: O very life of sweetness and hope
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary, paraphrasing the antiphon, ‘Salve regina’ (Anal. Hymn. L.318-19) — five 3-line stanzas with 2-line burden: ‘Salve regina mater misericordie / Uita dulcedo et spes nostra salue’
